Title: Enacts Caylee's law; establishes the crime of failure to report a child's disappearance or death
Summary: Enacts Caylee's law; establishes the crime of failure to report a child's disappearance or death, a class D felony; makes exception where child dies while under the medical care of a licensed physician.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of failure to report the death or disappearance of a child
